name: Ashes of Will
description:
A mystical adventure in an ancient land full of remains of an old civilization.

Created by 2 university students who study computer engineering.

There is a good chance that we will make this into a full game one day, but until then have fun playing this 10-15 minute long adventure and make sure to give us feedback on what you think could be improved on the game.

Since we are still developing our skills in all aspects of game development, we would really appreciate the feedback.  ^^

Note:

This game was completely made in 1 week during the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2.
